mapper.select: SELECT jpo_title,com_name,inter_date,inter_result,inter_grade,obj_state,obj_content, obj_date FROM objection o left outer join interview i on o.inter_no = i.inter_no left outer join apply a on i.apply_no = a.apply_no left outer join job_posting jp on a.jpo_no = jp.jpo_no left outer join company c on jp.com_id = c.com_id;
